snippet.title: GRIME - Definitive Edition Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the complete GRIME experience with the DEFINITIVE EDITION, including all of the game's DLCs:
Colors of Rot, Tinge of Terror, and the newly released Parting Shade!

Available on PC, Playstation 4/5, Xbox One/Series, and finally on Nintendo Switch!
